1435.TW.summary: Chung Fu Tex-International Corporation engages in the residential and building development, leasing, and sale business. It is also involved in the tobacco and alcohol retail business; and warehousing activities. The company was formerly known as Chung Fu Zhenye Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chung Fu Tex-International Corporation in July 2010. Chung Fu Tex-International Corporation was founded in 1970 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1503.TW.summary: Shihlin Electric & Engineering Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of heavy electrical equipment, electrical machinery, electrical automotive equipment, and related parts in Taiwan, Mainland China, Vietnam, and internationally. It operates through Electric Distribution, Automobile Parts, Automation Equipment and Parts, and Others segments. The company offers automobile parts, such as starters, alternators, fuel pumps, wiper systems, fan motors, warm gear motors, clutch motors, exchange position motors, washer systems, ECU products, power window switches, auto rain sensors, and blind-spot warning systems; motorcycle parts, including AC generators, starters, and fuel pumps; and DC motors, which include gear, transaxle, DC, and right angle motors. It also provides breaker switchgear and systems consist of miniature circuit breakers, molded case circuit breakers, air circuit breakers, magnetic contactors/switches, manual motor starters, surge protective devices, and automatic transfer switches; and heavy electric systems, such as power and oil immersed transformers, cast resin transformers, pad and pole mounted transformers, PT/CT products, high voltage switches, capacitors, and switchgears. In addition, the company offers factory automation products, including AC drives, HMI products, AC servo motors and drives, and temperature controllers; and automatic handling systems, as well as digital products. Further, it is involved in the operating, sale, and maintenance of vending machines; manufacture and sale of aluminum alloy die-casting, lathe, cutting, and molding products; import and export trade and agency business; competitive and recreational sports business; and sale and lease of commercial buildings. Shihlin Electric & Engineering Corp. was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1504.TW.summary: TECO Electric & Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, installation, wholesale, and retail of electronic equipment, telecommunication equipment, office equipment, and home appliances worldwide. It offers low, medium, and high voltage motors; system and automation products comprising AC servo driving systems, programmable logic controllers, human-machine interfaces, and robots; electromechanical engineering and power equipment; and household and air conditioning appliances. The company also develops wind turbines, electric cars, and PV power station products; and integrates Internet of Things, and cloud-end products and systems, as well as provides solutions for smart-card applications in various fields. In addition, it manufactures and sells switches, busway and related components, touch-tone phone systems, billing boxes, generators, reducers, electric control products, and air conditioners mechanical equipment; repairs electric appliances; provides business management consulting services; invests in securities; offers fiber optic cables, interconnects, transceivers/media converters, patch cords, and LC connectors and adapters; and constructs commercial buildings. Further, the company offers investment consultancy services for domestic and foreign industrial parks and lands; communication network information technology; science park development; develops and sells software; and provides storage and energy technical services. Additionally, it engages in the real estate business; coil wound motors and hydroelectric power; international trading; commissioned sale of phone and IC cards; production of data storage and processing equipment; provision of various business documents management, printing, and other mail services; services related to information software, data processing, and electronic information supply; and import, sale, and lease of franking machines. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1507.TW.summary: Yungtay Engineering Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, construction, sale, installation, repair, and maintenance of elevators, escalators, food delivery machines, central air conditioning units, and elevator motors in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers passenger, high speed, villa, machine room less, observation, medical and freight elevators, and escalators and automatic sidewalks. It is also involved in the real estate rental business. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1513.TW.long_name: Chung-Hsin Electric and Machinery Manufacturing Corp.
1513.TW.summary: Chung-Hsin Electric and Machinery Manufacturing Corp. manufactures and sells electric motors and generators in Taiwan and internationally. It operates through Electricity power, Engineering, and Service segments. It offers gas insulated switchgears, gas circuit breakers, gas insulated transmission lines and combined switchgears, fuse cutouts, load break switchgears, and low voltage switchgears; electro-mechanical, electronic single phase, and polyphase meters; and equipment for the monitoring and control of the electric facilities at power plants, wind farms, transformer stations, and distribution feeders. The company also provides precision air-conditionings for computer rooms, blowers for chiller systems, and chiller machines; alternators and diesel-electric engine sets; diesel generators; backup power fuel, cell systems; micro-grid systems; machine tool products; and precision machines for fabrication and welding, sheet metal works, surface treating, and inspection and test. In addition, it offers GIS/GCB welding tanks and enclosures, GIS/GCB aluminum casting tanks and enclosures, GIL enclosures, GIS/GCB aluminum conductors, stainless steel and aluminum vacuum chambers, and machining services and customer made parts; gas insulated transformer neutral grounding of disconnecting switch systems; DC power switchgears and neutral grounding resistors for transformers; and casting aluminum alloy conductors and pressure vessels for high-voltage GCB and ABS. Further, the company undertakes contracts for power generation and substation projects; constructs automatic parking facilities; and sells and rents residence and building properties. Additionally, it provides engineering, urban regeneration, energy management, and parking management services. The company was formerly known as Chung-Hsin Electric Factory and changed its name to Chung-Hsin Electric and Machinery Manufacturing Corp. in 1962. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1514.TW.summary: Allis Electric Co.,Ltd. produces and sells transformers, switching devices, and electronic products worldwide. The company offers uninterruptible power supply products for computers, network servers, data centers, telecommunication products, semiconductor manufacturing products, and petrochemical equipment; switching mode rectifiers and parallel inverters for telecom application; solar products; and DC power supply and battery chargers, which provide DC power equipment used in telephone exchanges, satellite base-stations, microwave links, rural telecommunications, railway switching controls, and switchgears. It also provides transmission and distribution pole line hardware and apparatus, such as switches, and transmission and distribution pole line hardware products; high-voltage metal-clad switchgears, gas-insulated switchgears, high and low voltage switchgears, motor control centers, control panels, and distribution panels; and oil-immersed, cast resin, dry type, amorphous core, and cast resin potential and current transformers. In addition, the company engages in the planning, design, installation, testing, operating manual, training, and after service on power station monitoring, as well as planning, managing, and servicing to procure, supply, and install electrical, mechanical, air-conditioning, environmental, and water drainage equipment and system projects. Its products are used in IT, telecommunication, industrial, wireless, utility, and supervisory control and data acquisition applications. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1515.TW.summary: Rexon Industrial Corp.,Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells bench power tools in the United States, Canada, Europe, Japan, and other Asian markets. The company offers power tools, including sawing, drilling, demolishing, grinding, polishing/sanding, cutting, planning/routing, and other products. It also provides fitness equipment, such as treadmills, as well as offers after sale services. The company was formerly known as KuoHsing Machinery Ltd. and changed its name to Rexon Industrial Corp.,Ltd in 1976. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

1517.TW.summary: Leechi Machinery Industry Ltd. Co. manufactures and sells bicycle components in Taiwan and internationally. Its product portfolio includes disc brakes, brakes and levers, seat posts, stems, handle bars, part accessories, and other products. The company provides its products under the PROMAX brand. The company was formerly known as Leechi Enterprise Co. Ltd. Leechi Machinery Industry Ltd. Co. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Changhua City, Taiwan.

1527.TW.summary: Basso Industry Corp. manufactures and sells pneumatic nailers and automotive air tools in the United States, Germany, Taiwan, Japan, Belgium, and internationally. The company offers pneumatic nailer, gas nailer, automotive air impact wrench, air ratchet wrench, intelligent industrial nailer, air saw and air hammer, air sander, air grinder, air carton closer, magnesium and aluminum alloy die-casting parts, and high-pressure pneumatic nailer and equipment. It also provides wire, finish, sheathing, and insulation staplers; headless pinners and other specialty products; corrugated, finish and concrete, angle finishing, angle framing, coil, collated joist hanger, anchor, palm, metal connector, and anchoring nailers; air drill and screw drivers; and OEM/ODM services. Basso Industry Corp. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1528.TW.summary: Anderson Industrial Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells computer numerical control (CNC) machineries in Germany, Taiwan, China, the United States, Australia, Brazil, Thailand, and internationally. It provides single and multi-spindle circuit boards; and spindles for use in milling, engraving, mold processing, 3C glass panel processing, high-speed grinding, PCB industry, and advanced materials processing applications. The company also offers CNC routers, MONFORTS, metal cutting machines, PCB routing and tool grinding machines, CNC Akut-series, CNC Laskut-series, and print and graphic machines for aerospace, automotive, composites material, marine, railway, wood, metal processing, and other industries. In addition, it provides tooling products, precision and electronic machineries, lumber and wood panels, building materials, and plates and other products. The company also imports and exports its products. Anderson Industrial Corporation was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1529.TW.summary: Klingon Aerospace Inc. designs, manufactures, installs, and trades in electrical products. It provides switchboards, and potential and current transformers; and electrical supplies, such as circuit breakers, reactors, resistors, high-voltage direct current power supply equipment, and other products. The company also offers network monitoring products, including remote terminal units, supervisory control and data acquisition systems, communication software and hardware, and others. In addition, it is involved in the design and construction of wind power, substation, and cogeneration turnkey works; and water and electricity distribution and construction turnkey works, as well as the provision of repair and test services, and sheet metal parts and aluminum products. Further, the company offers gas isolated switchgear facilities; electrostatic dust facilities; metal clad switchgears; load and motor control centers; matching system reactors; annular tube current transformers; and oil immersion type and molded case transformers, as well as systems engineering and electric power turnkey engineering services. It also provides in-flight solutions, such as air cable, Wi-Fi, mobile, and shopping solutions; and wind power generators and wind/solar hybrid street lights. The company was formerly known as Luxe Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Klingon Aerospace Inc. Klingon Aerospace Inc. was founded in 1978 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

1530.TW.summary: Awea mechantronic co.,ltd researches, designs, manufactures, assembles, tests, monitors, sells, and services various CNC machines in Taiwan and internationally. It offers vertical, production bridge, high-speed bridge, 5-face bridge, horizontal, and 5-axis milling, as well as horizontal boring machines; and tapping and automation products. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

1531.TW.summary: Kaulin Mfg. Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells industrial sewing machines in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include overlock; interlock; mulit-needle double chainstich; lockstitch; electric button holing; button sewing/bar-tracking; flatseamer; bandknife cutting; single thread chain-stitch button attaching; feed-off-the arm double chain stitch; cloth cutting; portable bag closer; zig-zag stitching; single, two, and three needle chainstitch; and other machines, as well as automatic sewing machines. Its machines are used in stitching various products, such as knitwear, jeans, and sportswear. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1535.TW.summary: China Ecotek Corporation operates as an engineering company in Taiwan. The company provides planning, design, manufacturing, construction/installation, maintenance, and trading services for the steel industry; plans, designs, fabricates, and erects piping and vessels, and steel structures for plant buildings and facilities; and plans, designs, constructs/installs, and maintains instrumentation and electrical engineering projects. It also designs/constructs civil and structure engineering projects; designs, fabricates, constructs, and commissions air pollution control systems, such as bag house and electric static precipitators, De-SOx systems, De-NOx systems, and acid gas cleaning systems; plans, designs, installs, and maintains water treatment and recycling systems; and offers water treatment chemicals and firefighting systems. In addition, it is involved in the planning, design, construction, equipment procurement, installation, and validation of biotech and pharmaceutical plants; construction, operation, and maintenance of incineration plants; construction and maintenance of co-generation and power plants; undertaking of refractory works; sale and construction of fire resistance products; and equipment/materials trading activities. China Ecotek Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

1537.TW.summary: Kung Long Batteries Industrial Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells lead-acid batteries in Taiwan and internationally. It offers products for use in cycling high-power, electric car, deep-cycle, renewable energy, and solar energy applications. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Nantou City, Taiwan.

1539.TW.summary: Chiu Ting Machinery Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells bench top and stationery woodworking machinery worldwide. It offers table saw, parallelogram jointer, and snipe planer series products. The company sells its products to importers, distributors, and retailers. Chiu Ting Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1541.TW.summary: CHANG TYPE Industrial Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells power tools. It provides miter, radial arm, band, and scroll saws. The company's products are used in other power tools, lawn and gardening, consumer electronics, and fitness applications. It also offers motors and IC control boards. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

1560.TW.summary: Kinik Company produces and sells various abrasives, cutting tools, and reclaimed wafers in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers various conventional grinding wheels, diamond/CBN grinding wheels, DLC coatings, reclaimed wafers, porous ceramic chuck tables, CMP diamond disks, ultra precision machining tools, dicing blades, diamond rollers, wafer grinding wheels, diamond and CBN honey comb wheels, and anti-slip type vacuum chucks. Kinik Company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1583.TW.summary: Goodway Machine Corp. develops, manufactures, and sells turning machines. It provides multi-axis turning, vertical turning, horizontal turning, swiss turning, and wheel turning products; grinders; and automation turning products, including bar feeders, gantry loading systems, loading and unloading systems, parts catchers and probes, tool presenters, and steady rests. The company offers its products through a network of dealers in Asia, the Americas, Africa, Europe, and Oceania. Goodway Machine Corp. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1590.TW.summary: AirTAC International Group, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and supplies pneumatic equipment worldwide. The company offers standard, miniature, compact/ultracompact, multi-mounting, twin- and tri-rod, slide table, rodless, rotary table, twist clamp, clamp, unclamping, and stopper cylinders, as well as air grippers and accessories. It also provides solenoid, air, manual control, mechanical control and other, and fluid control valves; air preparation units, including F.R.L. combination, FR.L. combination, filter and regulator, filter, regulator, lubricator, soft star-up and safe on-off valve, air distribution block, drain, and pressure gauge units. In addition, the company offers accessories, such as shock absorbers, polyurethane tubings, fittings, silencers, and speed controllers; and standard digital pressure switches. Further, it provides HRBS blade swing cylinders, HFKP dust-proof pneumatic fingers, DSC cylinders, stainless mini cylinders, diaphragm cylinders; and proportional solenoid, 6D integrated, 6V400/600 solenoid, 2WA valves. Additionally, the company offers shut-off, slow open, assembled pressure regulator, quick drain, shuttle, and double pressure valves; DPH analog output digital display switches, DPS digital display air pressure switches, DPHF acid and alkali resistant digital display switches, DPSW/DPHW waterproof digital display switches, and strong magnetic sensors; standard linear guideway, LSD ball screws, dust-proof standard linear guideway, and LRW wide micro linear guideway; belt driven linear slider, screw slider, and linear module actuators; stepping and servo motors; and B60 clean products and air indicators. Its products are used in automotive, machinery manufacturing, metallurgy, electronics, environmental protection, lighting and textile, ceramics, medical equipment, food, and packaging automatic industrial fields. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1597.TW.summary: Chieftek Precision Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells linear motion components in Taiwan. It offers compact linear motor and moving magnet stage products, linear motor servo drivers, magnetic encoders, iron core and ironless linear motors, DD motors, standard 4-row ball bearing linear guides, wide 4-row ball bearing linear guides, standard 4-row roller-type linear guides, miniature linear guides, industrial robots, and ST miniature stroke slide series products, as well as photovoltaic and semiconductor process equipment. The company also provides external NBR seal, metal and plastic caps, metal stopper on rail, and lubrication kit and grease gun. It also exports its products to the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. Chieftek Precision Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

1605.TW.summary: Walsin Lihwa Corporation manufactures and sells bare copper wires, wires and cables, and specialty steel products in Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company offers copper bars, power cables, communication cables, optical cables, and industrial cables for construction, electric engineering, information appliance, power, and telecommunications companies for the use in shipbuilding, heavy machinery, solar and wind power generation, electric vehicles, and robotics; and copper rods, connectors, and components for the cable and wire, communications cable, heavy electronics, and home electrical appliance industries. It also provides stainless steel products, including billets/slabs/ingots, wire rods, straight bars, cold-and hot-rolled coils, precision foils, seamless pipes and tubes, and steel cables and wires, as well as smelting, rolled stainless steel and carbon steel products, and precision alloy wires for construction component, crankshaft, machine tool, plumbing, heat exchanger, drain, and petrochemical industries. In addition, the company engages in the development, construction, operation, management, and rental of residences, offices, markets, estate complexes, and hotels, as well as offers after-sales services. Further, it designs, installs, and manages solar power systems; and manufactures and sells copper alloys, alloy materials, flat-rolled products, and medium and heavy specialty steel plates. Additionally, the company provides mechanical, electrical, communications, and power systems; light emitter diode and solar power assemblies; solar module assemblies; and electronic devices and modules; and construction, business and assets management, consulting, advertising, and commerce services. It also constructs, rents, and sells buildings and industrial factories; and engages in the property management and housing leasing, and solar power businesses. Walsin Lihwa Corporation was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1616.TW.summary: Evertop Wire Cable Corporation engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of wires and cables in Taiwan. The company offers bare and electrical wires; and power, communication, optical fiber, solar, electrical hybrid, water-resistant type, and electric vehicle cables under the EVERTOP brand. Its products are used in the building infrastructure, such as offices, residences, schools, hospitals, and industrial parks; and public transportation, including subways, tunnels, high-speed rail systems, stations, and airports. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1809.TW.summary: China Glaze Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ceramic glaze materials. The company offers frits, pigments, ameloblasts, zirconium silicates, print glazes, vetrosa glazes, and digital inks. It also provides building construction materials, such as crystal glass; ceramic tiles; and photoelectric and nano materials. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

2049.TW.summary: Hiwin Technologies Corp. manufactures and sells motion control and systematic technology products worldwide. The company operates through Linear Guideways, Ballscrews, and Others segments. It offers ballscrews, linear guideways, end effectors, datorker robot reducers, bearings, and torque motor rotary tables, as well as single and multi-axis robots; and medical robots and equipment; and aerospace automation equipment parts, as well as computer numerical control milling machines. The company provides components, industrial robots, special machines, and after-sales services for machine tools, industrial machinery, bioscience, medical equipment, equipment of electronics industry, photo-electricity, semiconductor devices and automation, etc. It also engages in the research, development, design, and manufacture of solar cells, electronic components, electric power supplies, and electric transmission and power distribution machinery products, as well as gear cutting tools and machinery; provision of thread forming machinery; and sale of gear cutting tools and machinery. The company offers its products under the HIWIN brand name. Hiwin Technologies Corp. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2062.TW.summary: Sunspring Metal Corporation manufactures and sells zinc, brass, and plastic parts worldwide. The company offers components for bathroom accessories, door hardware, and communications equipment. It serves hardware, automotive, kitchen and bath plumbing, communications equipment, and other related industries. Sunspring Metal Corporation was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2208.TW.summary: CSBC Corporation engages in building, manufacturing, and repairing various ships and onshore equipment. The company offers bulk, cement, and product carriers; and container ships, reefer vessels, tankers, tug boats, and naval ships, as well as oil drilling rigs. It also provides marine works; offshore wind turnkey services; and engineering services, such as manufacture, installation, assembly, and shipping of domestic and international ship unloaders, as well as level luffing cranes. In addition, the company manufactures marine hardware comprising rudder and stern frames, and lashing bridges; and offers ship coating, anti-corrosion coating on large steel structures, surface treatment, and professional coating services. It operates in Taiwan, Singapore, Marshall Islands, Hong Kong, Panama, and internationally. The company was formerly known as China Shipbuilding Corporation and changed its name to CSBC Corporation in March 2007. CSBC Corporation was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2233.TW.summary: TURVO International Co., Ltd. provides modular solutions in the machining industry in Taiwan and internationally. The company primarily offers precision parts for industrial use. It also provides professional metal processing services, including machining, automation integration, heat treatment, and forging. The company's products have application in auto parts, such as engine common rail parts, variable timing system parts, suspension system parts, and other parts; medical parts comprising insulin syringe parts; bike hubs, shock absorber, etc.; industrial components that include various industrial use sleeves, connecting rings, compressor parts, etc.; and optical lens, which comprise connecting rings and cum to lens applications. TURVO International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

2371.TW.summary: Tatung Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides power, consumer, and system solutions in Taiwan, China, Asia, Europe, the United States, Southeast Asia, and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Optical Department, Machinery and Energy Department, Consumer Products Department, and Real Estate Development Department. It offers products and services, such as steel manufacturing machinery, industrial appliances, household appliances, refrigerators, air conditioners, metal processing machineries, electronic products, wires and cables, chemicals, cookware products, wood-made products, plastics, office equipment, audio products, precision meters, and transmission equipment. The company also provides products and services that include transportation facilities, health care products, microbe fermentation products, construction, furniture products, solar wafers, water treatment engineering, telecommunication equipment, parking facilities, automation machinery, semiconductors, and real estate development and leasing. In addition, it engages in publishing magazines, as well as offering customs brokerage; the general import and export business; and development and leasing of industrial parks. Tatung Co., Ltd. was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2373.TW.summary: Aurora Corporation provides office automation equipment, office furniture, communications, 3D printers, air purifiers, office cloud and electronic goods, etc. in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It also offers hardware services, as well as software and hardware integration solutions. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2390.TW.summary: Everspring Industry Co., Ltd. produces and sells burglar alarms, surveillance devices, home automation appliances, and security lightings worldwide. The company offers smart home systems and alarm kits; and household control panel, a digital smart panel that utilizes a power line and single network cable to combine various household facilities, including access control, intercom, security, and scene control, as well as value-added services. It also provides household intercom, a touch screen for video communication and digital message transmission, as well as security services. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2421.TW.long_name: Sunonwealth Electric Machine Industry Co., Ltd.
2421.TW.summary: Sunonwealth Electric Machine Industry Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells precision motors, mini fans, and thermal modules worldwide. The company offers DC fans and blowers, AC and EC fans, customized solutions, and fan trays; LED cooling solutions, such as active cooling modules and fans; and fan accessories, such as metal finger guards, plastic guards, metal filter guards, plastic filter guards, and AC cords; and ventilation fans under the SUNON brand. It serves automobile electronic, optical electronic, and network communication industries. Sunonwealth Electric Machine Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

2433.TW.summary: Huxen Corporation provides office products in Taiwan. The company offers photocopiers, multifunctional service machines, laser printers, digital printing machines, and 3D printing, as well as network communication products, including telephone exchange, peripheral goods, firewall commodity, and Internet goods. It also provides software systems comprising solutions, app application, and transaction machine cloud systems; video systems, such as commercial projectors and video conferencing systems; and cloud systems. In addition, the company offers cloud, file, 3D, and communication solutions. It also rents and repairs electronic and mechanical components; and sells wireless communication transmission equipment, as well as provides project contracting and installation services. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2438.TW.summary: Enlight Corporation develops, produces, and sells LED lightning products in Taiwan. Its products include LED tubes, shelf lights, bulb lights, panel lights, recessed lights, ceiling lights, remote control tables, projection lights, patio lights, spotlights, track lights, box lights, and dimmers. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2440.TW.summary: Space Shuttle Hi-Tech Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells telecommunication wires and cables. The company operates through four divisions: Wires, Electrical Products, Optical Cables, and Optic Electrical. It offers a range of wires for the computer, communication cable, and electronic products. The company sells its products in Taiwan, Mainland China, Japan, Australia, Europe, and the United States. Space Shuttle Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

2457.TW.summary: Phihong Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells power supply products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers power adaptors, power over Ethernet products, EV chargers, and worksite radios for personal electronics, networking, POS, small home appliance, medical, industrial, construction, and electric vehicle applications. It serves telecom, datacom, personal electronics, and industrial markets. The company was formerly known as Phihong Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Phihong Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2003. Phihong Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

2464.TW.summary: Mirle Automation Corporation manufactures and sells automation system integrators and related products. It offers automated equipment for clean room FPD transporter and material-handling, such as CF in-line C/V systems, LCD/LCM auto packing/palletizing systems, clean room stockers, burr checkers, bonders, LD/ULD and CSLD products, dense packing/unpacking systems, in-line aging systems, and equipment for clean room robot applications; and robotic application systems for general, optronic, and semiconductor industries. The company also provides IT products, including IBM systems, servers, bladecenters, and storage and system networking products, as well as POS products; storage management, enterprise asset management, virtualization infrastructure, security, and AS/RS system solutions; and IT services comprising virtual desktop infrastructure, Oracle DB technical support, server and Linux integration and virtualization, warranty maintenance, virtualized storage management, enterprise project management, and enterprise private cloud management services. In addition, it offers servo drivers, injection molding controllers, and air condition system controllers, as well as controllers for various industries; and clean room automatic and general environmental material handling systems, and ancillary systems. Further, the company provides special purpose equipment, such as optical glass molding presses, liquid management auto samplers, and food industry machinery. It serves the FPD, semiconductor, automobile, IT, machinery, food, solar cell, LED, and touch panel industries. Mirle Automation Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

2474.TW.summary: Catcher Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells aluminum and magnesium extrusions, and stamping products and molds in Taiwan and China. It offers casing, internal components, molds, and thermal modules for electronic products. The company's products include upper case, lower case, keyboard cover, and monitor casings for notebook computers; casings for various server specifications and desktop computers; industrial computer casings and internal parts; and computer accessories, such as plugs and A/V connector casings. The company also produces customized thin and precision-oriented communication application products, such as phones and pad-like products, as well as communication accessories, such as earphones and camera heads; and consumer electronic products, such as digital still cameras, camcorders, MP3 products, and related accessories. In addition, it offers ventilation blades, air-power tools, automobiles, TVs and lightning equipment. Further, the company manufactures, sells, and develops varied metal products; and engages in the trading, leasing, and investing activities. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

2476.TW.summary: G-SHANK Enterprise Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells precision progressive dies and stamped metal parts worldwide. Its products are used in molding, automotive, medical, and industrial parts; electronics components; and automotive cameras. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

2482.TW.summary: Uniform Industrial Corporation provides customized solutions for the payment industry in Taiwan and internationally. Its product portfolio includes magnetic stripes, smart chips, and decoder integrated circuits. The company offers secure card readers, contactless readers, MSR readers, hybrid card readers, check readers, unattended systems, decoder chips, countertop systems, and POS systems. Uniform Industrial Corporation was founded in 1983 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2489.TW.summary: AmTRAN Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of flat-panel TVs in Taiwan and internationally. It offers OEM/ODM display; MFG LCD monitor; PDs audio device; mouse; and webcam. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2492.TW.summary: Walsin Technology Corporation manufactures and sells passive components worldwide. The company provides multiple-layer ceramic chip capacitors/arrays, chip-resistors/arrays and networks, RF filters, inductors, disc capacitors, varistors, antennas, chip fuses, thin film products, safety components, modules, etc. Its products are used in mobile device, networking, automotive, industrial, power supply, IoT, green energy, PC and peripherals, and lighting. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2535.TW.summary: Da-Cin Construction Co.,Ltd. operates as a construction company in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers engineering, procurement, and construction services for roads, bridges, tunnels, and hillside development; and housing complexes, commercial office buildings, schools, hotels, hospitals, supermarkets, department stores, shopping centers, deep-excavation and high rises, and other construction works. It also provides engineering, procurement, and construction services for wafer factories, LCD panel factories, glass substrate and passive component factories, IC packaging factories, and other high-tech compounds; and MRT, underground railways, and other transportation construction. In addition, the company offers land cooperation, real estate sales, and new home after sales services. Da-Cin Construction Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2543.TW.long_name: Hwang Chang General Contractor Co., Ltd
2543.TW.summary: Hwang Chang General Contractor Co., Ltd engages in construction activities in Taiwan. It undertakes the construction of public work and government contract turnkey, pumping station, baseball stadium, avenue, boulevard, road, highway, sewage treatment plant, underground station, expressway, sub-mountain diversion, and pipeline projects. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2597.TW.summary: Ruentex Engineering & Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the civil and architectural construction contracting business in Taiwan and internationally. The company is involved in the design, planning, and construction and project management of various projects, including housings, villas, office buildings, high-tech plants, etc. It also manufactures and sells precast concrete products. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2601.TW.summary: First Steamship Company, Ltd. operates as a shipping company in Taiwan. The company engages in dry bulk carrier shipping operations that include the transportation of various bulk commodities comprising iron ores, coal, and agricultural products. It is also involved in vessel management operations; and the provision of crewing services, such as crewmember recruitment, selection, and training. The company owns and operates 10 vessels, including 1 Panamax, 2 Handysize, 3 Kansamax, and 4 Supramax vessels with a capacity of approximately 536,424 dead weight tonnage. First Steamship Company, Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2605.TW.summary: Sincere Navigation Corporation, a shipping transportation company, owns and operates bulk cargo vessels in Taiwan. Its fleet includes dry bulk carriers, tankers, and woodchip carriers. As of December 31, 2019, the company had a fleet of 17 vessels, including 3 very large crude carrier tankers and 14 dry bulk vessels of various tonnages. It serves coal and iron ore miner, steel, energy, and paper industries. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2606.TW.summary: U-Ming Marine Transport Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the marine transportation business worldwide. It owns and manages ships that transport dry bulk cargoes, such as cement, oil, coal, iron ore, and grain products. The company is also involved in trading vessels; and providing agency services, as well as the investment business. It operates 48 vessels with a total deadweight of 6.71 million tons. The company was formerly known as Yue Ming Transportation Co. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. U-Ming Marine Transport Corporation is a subsidiary of The Far Eastern Group.

2609.TW.summary: Yang Ming Marine Transport Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides shipping, repair, and chartering services in Taiwan, North America, South America, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It also purchases and sells ships, containers, and chassis. In addition, the company acts as a property, shipping, forwarding, and inland forwarding agent; and shipping manager. Further, it is involved in the warehouse and terminal operations, as well as the provision of insurance, cargo consolidation, container transportation, stevedoring, and logistics services. Yang Ming Marine Transport Corporation was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Keelung, Taiwan.

2611.TW.summary: Tze Shin International Co. Ltd. primarily provides transportation services in Taiwan. The company offers cargo freight, container, truck, and oil transportation services, as well as petrochemical and damage goods transportation services; and bulk logistic services. It also engages in the development, planning, and construction of factories, shopping malls, and residential buildings; and provides ticket sales management services. The company was formerly known as Tze Shin Transportation & Terminal Co.Ltd and changed its name to Tze Shin International Co. Ltd. in July 2002. Tze Shin International was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2616.TW.summary: Shan-Loong Transportation Co.,Ltd operates gas stations in Taiwan. It also provides container and bulk transportation services; and logistics and warehousing services, as well as sells oil products. In addition, the company engages in shipside dumping operations; vehicle repair and inspection businesses; and greenhouse biotechnology orchid garden and cultivation activities. Further, it provides custom declaration, and environment safety and security services. The company was formerly known as Wang Pai Transportation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shan-Loong Transportation Co.,Ltd in 1982. Shan-Loong Transportation Co.,Ltd was founded in 1976 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2618.TW.summary: EVA Airways Corp., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the aviation business in Taiwan, Asia, Europe, North America, and internationally. The company operates through Aviation Transportation, Maintenance, Catering, and Other segments. The Aviation Transportation segment is involved in the aviation transportation of passengers and cargo. The Maintenance segment maintains aircrafts, engines, and aircraft parts. The Catering segment is involved in providing catering services. The Other segment provides ground handling, travel agency, cargo distribution, investment, and flight training activities. The company also manufactures aircraft parts. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 84 aircraft, including 79 passenger jets and 5 freighters. EVA Airways Corp. was founded in 1989 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2633.TW.summary: Taiwan High Speed Rail Corporation operates and manages high speed rail system in Taiwan. It operates a 350 kilometers length of rail system that links Nangang, Taipei, Banqiao, Taoyuan, Hsinchu, Miaoli, Taichung, Changhua, Yunlin, Chiayi, Tainan, and Zuoying service stations. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2642.TW.summary: Taiwan Pelican Express Co., Ltd. provides trucking and door-to-door home delivery services in Taiwan. It offers C2C, B2C, and C2B home-delivery services. The company also provides warehousing and logistics services, as well as merchandise services and other services. Its fleet consist of 1,100 home delivery vehicles. Taiwan Pelican Express Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3002.TW.summary: AHOKU Electronic Company provides smart home solutions. The company offers travel adapters and converters, USB chargers, power sockets, cabinet power strips, outlets surge protectors, wireless IP cameras, wireless chargers, Wi-Fi travel routers, car inverters, AC plugs, battery backups, alarm sensors, passive infrared sensors, smart sockets, moisture sensors, and night vision cameras, as well as wireless security cameras, door and window sensors, and Bluetooth smart sockets. AHOKU Electronic Company was founded in 1983 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3003.TW.summary: K.S. Terminals Inc. manufactures and sells electrical terminals, wire accessories, lighting systems, electric vehicle charging connectors, automotive connectors, nylon cable ties, and green energy connectors in Taiwan and internationally. Its electrical terminal products include insulated and non-insulated copper terminals, insulated quick disconnectors, din terminals, cord end terminals, water proof heat shrinkable terminals with adhesive tubing, butt splice and other connectors, stainless steel ties, JIS terminals, battery modular connectors, and tools, as well as copper tubular lugs. The company also offers continual type terminals, and white goods terminals and housings. The company was formerly known as Ken Shing Industrial shop and changed its name to K.S. Terminals Inc. in 1978. K.S. Terminals Inc. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Changhua City, Taiwan.

3004.TW.summary: National Aerospace Fasteners Corporation manufactures and sells fastener products for the aerospace, electronics, and high-end industrial sectors in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers aero products, including bolts; nuts, such as hex nuts, 10 PT nuts, double hex nuts, spline nuts kits, shank nuts, gang channels, and anchor nuts; and CNC products comprising tubes, stampings, links, latches, and fittings, as well as other products consisting of adapters, brackets, bushings, clamps, flanges, guides, housings, inertial dampers, pins, fixing plates, retainers, seals, sleeves, spacers, weights, etc. that are used in aircraft engines and airframes. It also provides industrial products, such as blind rivet nuts, rivet studs, brass inserts, machining and customized parts, and high temperature resistant self-locking nuts used in automobiles, ships, public transportation vehicles, and various other industrial products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3027.TW.summary: Billion Electric Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and distributes power transformers, power supplies, and other power-related products in Europe, North/South America, the Middle East, Africa, and the Asia-Pacific markets. It offers network/telecom products comprising in-home broadband, enterprise networking, and outdoor 4G/LTE routers; machine to machine and Internet of Things products for the telecommunication industry; xDSL, xDSL wireless AP, xDSL wireless AP VoIP, and active Ethernet fiber series products; indoor and outdoor LED drivers, AC/DC power adaptors, open frame power supplies, power transformers, and POE injectors; and solar monitor meters, smart energy gateways, and smart energy meters. The company offers its products under the BILLION brand. Billion Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3167.TW.summary: Taliang Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells semiconductor inspection, resin panel cutters, and CNC engraving and milling machines in Taiwan. It provides optoelectronics, including glass panel processing machinery for touch panel, cover glass, sensor glass, or one glass processing applications; automatic edge coating machines; and PCB routing and drilling machines. The company also offers semiconductor inspection solution comprising FVI for carrier tape inspection; IR reel, semi-auto IR, and IR wafer for sidewall chipping around the die inspection; PRIM HBM for HBM chip type in reel inspection; wafer map that replaces human eye inspection of map; and testing handler for QFN/DFN/SOT/SOP IC inspection and packaging. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3308.TW.summary: Bestec Power Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, fabricates, markets, and sells switching power supply products worldwide. It provides LED drivers, adapters, open frames, and server/IPC products under the Bestec brand for lighting, medical, ITE, NB and PC, networking, and industrial applications. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3356.TW.summary: GeoVision Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a digital and networked video surveillance company worldwide. It offers IP cameras; and surveillance systems, including VMS, NVR, mini, Linux-based standalone, recording server, mobile, and storage systems, as well as accessories, such as remote controls, joysticks, keyboards, and touch displays. The company also provides video management software; access control products, which include software, IP control panels and kits, controllers, readers, and accessories; license plate recognition products, such as IP LPR, DSP LPR, and analog LPR cameras, as well as vehicle management software; decoder boxes and HD video encoders; digital signage products, such as signage players and slim-bezel signage displays; PoE switches, extenders, adapters, and accessories, as well as gigabit PoE switches; and capture cards and IO products. In addition, it offers technical support, specs consultation, RMA, and logistics services. The company provides its products for various fields of industries, such as retail, commercial, government, transportation, hospitals, gaming, and residence through distributors, system integrators, and installers. GeoVision Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3376.TW.summary: Shin Zu Shing Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision springs, stamped parts, and hinge assemblies in Taiwan. It also provides metal injection molding (MIM) and lathe products. The company offers its products for use in notebook and tablet PCs, LCD monitors, and MIM products, as well as communication, computer, and consumer products. The company was formerly known as Zu Shing Spring and Mechanical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shin Zu Shing Co., Ltd. in 1997. Shin Zu Shing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3432.TW.summary: Tai Twun Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various components and products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers cooler and heat pipe components; single card, IO, FPC, board, and battery connectors; and other components that are used in NB PC, mobile phone, 3.5G HSDPA, MFP printer, DVD, and LCD TV applications. It also provides consumer electronics products, such as AC USB adaptors, car chargers, and USB card readers. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3454.TW.summary: Vivotek Inc. provides security surveillance solutions worldwide. The company develops IP surveillance solutions that comprise network cameras, video servers and receivers, network video recorders, video management software, application software, and power over Ethernet switches, as well as offers cloud services. It also provides accessories comprising mounting kits, enclosures, covers, lens, power supply and box products, cables, joysticks, cabinets, cabinet accessories, storage products, water tanks, illuminators, and connectors. The company sells its products and services through distributors. Vivotek Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3504.TW.summary: Young Optics Inc. engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of optical components and modules in Taiwan. Its products include image lens, such as fixed lens, vari-focal lens, and high-speed dome lens; projection optics, including DLP optical engines, projection lens, color wheels, X-plate modules, rods, UV/IR filters and mirrors, and TIR prisms; mobile projection modules; and image systems, such as document cameras, pico DV systems, and security and video conference camera modules. The company also provides tooling services, mechanical parts, optical parts, optical modules, and system product development and assembly services. Young Optics Inc. was founded in 2002 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3550.TW.summary: Copartner Technology Corporation manufactures and sells cable and wire products for information, communications, and electronics industries worldwide. It offers consumer market cables, including USB, SFP/QSFP, plenum HDMI, and display port cables; and transportation cables comprising vehicle, marine, and aircraft video/audio and control cables. The company also provides industrial cables, such as control, flexible, chain, and robot cables; medical cables consisting of medical equipment, medical auto bed control, auto control system, and non-invasive medical device cables; and green energy cables, including solar tracker and EV cables. In addition, it offers communication cables, such as RG type, AISG, coaxial communication, and LAN cables. The company was formerly known as Cablex Wire & Cable Mfg. Corp. and changed its name to Copartner Technology Corporation in August 2004. Copartner Technology Corporation was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4526.TW.summary: Tongtai Machine & Tool Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells machines worldwide. The company offers machine tools, such as vertical machining, 5-axis machining, tapping, horizontal machining, 5-axis horizontal machining, multi-tasking turning, and ultrasonic assisted machining centers, as well as boring and milling machines, horizontal and vertical CNC lathes, and wheel machines; and PCB machines, including drilling and routing machines. It also provides laser drilling and marking machines; and additive manufacturing machines consisting of metal powder direct energy deposition and subtractive manufacturing, metal powder bed fusion, and sand binder jetting machines. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4532.TW.summary: Rechi Precision Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells compressors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers inverter and constant-speed rotary compressors; BLDC motors; inverter controllers; and heat pump water heaters. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4572.TW.summary: Drewloong Precision, Inc. produces and sells aero structural and engine parts, landing gear parts, and special tools to aircraft manufacturers. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

4576.TW.summary: Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of components, systems, and equipment for linear motion and positioning control in Taiwan and internationally. It offers drives and controllers, servo and linear actuators, positioning measurement systems, linear motors, linear motor stages, torque motor rotary tables, rotary motors, renewable power inverters, ballscrew and linear guideways, and single axis robots. The company provides its products for use in semiconductor, optical component manufacturing, automation, medicare and healthcare, and rehabilitation equipment, as well as transportation applications. Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan. Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp. is a subsidiary of Hiwin Technologies Corp.

4912.TW.summary: Lemtech Holdings Co., Limited manufactures and sells precision metal dies and metal stampings in Asia, Americas, and Europe. The company provides electronic product thermal modules, electronic product components, automotive components and building material components made by stamping and forming, as well as stamping die support for automotive and electronic product manufacturers; and stamping tools, heatsinks and thermal modules, slide rails, precision metal hinges, and mechanical assemblies. It serves automotive, cloud computing, smartphone, medical device, and industrial, as well as computing, consumer, and communication markets. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4999.TW.summary: Sinher Technology Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of various hinge products in Taiwan. The company offers NB hinges, including auto locks, springs, band type hinges, centrals, shafts, and Zn with plate and bend type hinges. It also provides detachable, NB module, and tablet module hinges; AIO and LCD hinges, such as base design type, picture frame type, and multi rotation type hinges; and 3C hinges comprising projector and POS hinges, as well as car hinge and projector products. Sinher Technology Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5007.TW.summary: San Shing Fastech Corp. manufactures and sells steel nuts worldwide. The company offers nut products, including weld, flange, clinch, slotted, locking, wheel, nylon insert, hot forming square and hot forming, and GEOMET coating, as well as auto parts, torque converter parts, customized fasteners, collar, sleeve and spacer, and nut with washer; and bolt products, such as knurled, weld, external 6-lobe, GEOMET coating, shoulder, clinch, special alloy, customized, internal serrated, internal 6-lobe, and double end bolts. It also provides washers, stamping washers and fasteners, and stamping parts and assembly parts; tooling products, which include segmented dies for nut and bolt, carbide six-lobe punch and dies, carbide hex punch, and hot forging and customized tooling; and machinery, such as nut and bolt formers, spindles an round nut tapping machines, optical nut and bolt sorting machines, bolt measurement systems, and nylon insert assembly machines. The company was formerly known as San Shing Hardware Works Co., Ltd. and changed its name to San Shing Fastech Corp. in July 2002. San Shing Fastech Corp. was founded in 1965 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

5484.TW.summary: EverFocus Electronics Corporation manufactures and sells security equipment worldwide. The company offers Edge Computer, a smart surveillance system that provide real-time surveillance footage and access to traffic and road conditions. It also provides multiple interface camera for industrial computers, including USB, RJ-45, etc. In addition, the company offers mobile app and management software that cover transportation, education, surveillance, retail, and medical health care; and vehicle surveillance products and accessories. EverFocus Electronics Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5515.TW.summary: Chien Kuo Construction Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business in Taiwan and China. The company offers construction services for residential buildings, factory and office buildings, public facilities, and commercial buildings; undertakes the related electrical and mechanical engineering of air-conditioning, water and electricity, fire-fighting, intelligent building, etc.; and manages electromechanical projects. It also manufactures and sells commercial concrete; and participates in concrete supply and pumping for construction of roads, bridges, and residential projects. The company is also involved in the procurement, planning, installation, and consultation activities; and provision of cargo handling, international trade, and computer software technology development and consultation services. Chien Kuo Construction Co., Ltd. was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5519.TW.summary: LongDa Construction & Development Corporation engages in the provision of construction services primarily in Taiwan. It also involves in the real estate development and leasing, and hotel business. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

5521.TW.summary: Kung Sing Engineering Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business in Taiwan. Its projects include roads, bridges, tunnels, residential buildings, airports, and railways, as well as marine works. The company was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5607.TW.long_name: Farglory Free Trade Zone Investment Holding Co., Ltd
5607.TW.summary: Farglory Free Trade Zone Investment Holding Co., Ltd operates free trade zone in Taiwan. The park provides enterprises various commercial services and facilities, including automated warehousing facilities; an economic and trading special operation zone which encompasses land, sea, and air transport; and an air cargo terminal, a forwarders building, an international logistics center, and an enterprise business center. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

5608.TW.summary: Shih Wei Navigation Co., Ltd. operates as a dry cargo shipping company in Taiwan. It engages in the shipping transportation, shipping agency, and ship management and chartering, as well as ship sale and purchase activities. The company trades in various types of bulk cargo, such as steel products, ores, etc., as well as equipment, wooden cargos, wood pulps, general cargos, and logs. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6115.TW.long_name: I-Sheng Electric Wire & Cable Co., Ltd.
6115.TW.summary: I-Sheng Electric Wire & Cable Co., Ltd. provides plugs and connectors, power supply cords, LAN cables, and electronic signal cables in Taiwan and internationally. It also offers photovoltaic wires; power strips and night light products; hook up wires, coaxial cables, telephone wires, computer cables, and computer peripheral cables; oxygen index materials; thermal stability cables and Congo red materials; and injection, non-migration, matte, weather and oil resistant, modified and elastic, and abrasive materials. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6164.TW.summary: Ledtech Electronics Corp. produces and sells LED lamps and displays in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers PLCC and high power lighting class components; light modules/engines; flexible and rigid light strips; and standard, super bright, super flux, and bi-color lamps, as well as IR/PT lamps and light sensors. It also provides single digit, dual digit, three digit, four digit, alphanumeric, dot matrix, intelligent, light bar, bar array, and SMT displays; top view, chip LED, right angle, and UVA/UVC SMD products, as well as axial LED products with plastic holders; and backlights. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6215.TW.summary: Aurotek Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automation and robotic components under the Aurotek brand in Japan, rest of Asia, Europe, and the United States. Its products include automation and robotics components, such as motors, reducers, sensors, PLC controllers, couplings, ball screws, linear axis actuators, linear bearing systems, motion controllers, motion control ICs, CNC systems, robot control systems, visual identity systems, automatic guided vehicles, self-lube bearings, precision stages, wicking materials, electric blowers, and environmental equipment. The company also offers FA and equipment comprising PCB depaneling systems, robot systems, optical communication machines, DeMeet 3D CNC coordinate measuring machines, and electric screw drivers; and patterning technology and applications, patterned technology and equipment, automatic optical inspection equipment, and laser processing equipment. In addition, it provides isolation and damping devices, natural ventilation systems, and EcoColor external venetian blinds. The company provides solutions to self-lubricated parts; transmissions; power transmissions; drive systems; controllers and robotics for PCB, SMT, LCD, optical, solar, and semiconductor equipment; architectural applications/designs for window operators; seismic isolation systems; and anti-earthquake devices. Aurotek Corporation was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6235.TW.summary: Waffer Technology Corporation manufactures and sells light metal products. The company primarily engages in the provision of light-metal solution of magnesium and aluminum alloy, mold and tooling research and development, magnesium alloy injection and die-casting, CNC, and painting and assembly of vertical integration OEM/ODM processing. Its products include cosmetic and internal parts for notebooks; handheld scanners and mobile phone parts; camera, video cam, projector, and monitoring optical parts; and auto parts, as well as other products, such as wearable, tool, and sports products. The company also manufactures and processes automotive aluminum alloy die-cast tools, 3C product magnesium injection tools, and other light metal die-casting tools, as well as fixtures and gauges. It serves medical, industrial, telecommunications, construction, automotive, sporting goods, aeronautical, transportation, national defense, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Waffer Industrial Company, Limited and changed its name to Waffer Technology Corporation in 2000. Waffer Technology Corporation was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6282.TW.summary: AcBel Polytech Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells power management solutions worldwide. It provides a range of custom design and high quality power supplies ranging from 3W up to 10,000W per power module. The company offers industrial PSUs, adapters, medical PSUs, telecom PSUs, AC DC / DC DC converters, smart solutions, and backup solutions. Its products are used in information technology, communication, consumer electronics, networks, and industrial automation applications. The company was formerly known as API Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AcBel Polytech Inc. in 1998. AcBel Polytech Inc. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6409.TW.summary: Voltronic Power Technology Corp. primarily designs, manufactures, markets, introduces, and sells uninterruptible power systems (UPS) in Taiwan and China. The company provides DC, standby, line interactive, and online UPS products; and solar power products, solar inverters, automatic voltage regulators, chargers, and accessories. It also offers ODM design and manufacturing of inverters. The company primarily serves the power market. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6412.TW.summary: Chicony Power Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures and sells switching power supplies, electronic components, LED lighting modules, and smart building solutions in Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. Its power supply products include adapters and power products used in the area of server, storage, telecom, desk-top, gaming, ATM, open frame, and industry power. The company offers LED lamps, tubes, and indoor and outdoor LED luminaires and drivers. It also manufactures and sells transformers and plastic products. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6438.TW.summary: Symtek Automation Asia Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures automation system solutions. The company offers automation equipment for printed circuit board, flexible board, IC substrate and packaging, high density interconnect board, and ceramic substrate applications. It is also involved in the design and provision of customized machines for applications in laser technology equipment, TFT-LCD flat panel screens, LEDs, touch panels, and LGP; and wafer, cell, and module manufacturing machines, including inspection systems, as well as intelligent automation integration services. The company was formerly known as SCHMID Automation Asia Co., Ltd. Symtek Automation Asia Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6558.TW.summary: SYNergy ScienTech Corp. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells rechargeable lithium-ion and lithium-ion polymer batteries in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in various portable electronic products, such as Bluetooth headsets, MP3 and DSC products, cellular phones, and notebook computers, as well as other products. SYNergy ScienTech Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6706.TW.summary: Fittech Co.,Ltd provides automatic equipment and system integration services for the optoelectronic, semiconductor, and laser industries. The company offers LED probing and testing equipment, including LED chip and wafer probing and testing systems; fully automatic LED wafer prober systems; auto flip-chip probers; auto LED chip probers and tester; high accuracy automatic chip counters; and automatic detaching tape systems. It also provides LD probing and testing equipment, such as VCSEL(PD) probing and testing systems, and edge emitting laser probing and sorting systems; and laser micromachining equipment comprising automatic dual-arm laser wafer and laser wafer marking systems, fully-auto laser marking (inking) systems, and semi-auto PCB laser drilling systems, as well as semi-auto laser cutting, drilling, and scribing systems. In addition, the company offers laser metal machining equipment, including handheld laser cleaning and welding machines; and OEM and LED OEM services. Its products are also used in other photonics and optics, electronics, automotive, and manufacturing industries. The company operates in Taiwan, China, and rest of Asia, as well as internationally. Fittech Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

6754.TW.long_name: Rich Honour International Designs Co., Ltd.
6754.TW.summary: Rich Honour International Designs Co., Ltd. operates as an interior design company in Greater China and internationally. It offers various services, including branding, R&D, design, technology, construction, production, and project management services. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

8021.TW.summary: Topoint Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells micro-drills, numerically controlled drilling machines, and peripheral equipment for printed circuit boards in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company offers products, such as drill bit, a product used in PCB mechanical drilling process; router bit, a material used for achieving necessary outlines; and slot drills used in cutting forces, as well as logarithmic cylindrical roller, a solution for conventional bearing manufactures. It also provides standard cutting tools used in industrial milling applications, which include stamping, and profile and face milling; and customized cutting tools for metal casing production and metal injection process. In addition, the company offers drilling services comprising mechanical and laser drilling, routing, and CCD routing services. Topoint Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8114.TW.summary: Posiflex Technology, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells industrial computers and peripheral equipment in Taiwan, the United States, Germany, Japan, India, China, Singapore, and Malaysia. The company operates through Domestic, USA, and Others segments. It provides mobile POS, POS terminal, all in one POS, infotainment terminal, digital signage, POS box, and kiosk products, as well as android platform. The company also offers POS monitors, line displays, POS printers, cash drawers, POS keyboards, barcode scanners, magnetic stripe card readers, attachments, MT accessories, signature pads, and IO boxes. In addition, it trades in electronic parts; and offers software and warranty services. The company serves customers in the retail, catering, large-scale shopping centers, chain stores, entertainment venues, logistics, medical institutions, and e-commerce businesses under the POSIFLEX brand name. Posiflex Technology, Inc. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8341.TW.long_name: Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd.
8341.TW.summary: Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the medical waste incineration business in Taiwan and China. The company is involved in the collection, incineration, solidification, physicochemical, transportation, landfill, and treatment of hazardous, general business, and bio-medical wastes. It also manufactures and sells pollution control equipment. In addition, the company engages in the installation engineering for waste cleaning activities; environmental engineering consulting activities; and environmental protection engineering construction activities. Further, it is involved in the waste treatment, waste removal, material recovery, resource recycling, environmental testing and sanitation activities; and design and manufacture, test set-up, and operation of equipment. The company was formerly known as Sunny Friend Waste Disposal co., ltd. and changed its name to Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2000. Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Yunlin County, Taiwan.

8367.TW.summary: Chien Shing Harbour Service Co.,Ltd. provides customs declaration, transportation, warehousing, ship stevedoring, and container terminal services in Taiwan. The company offers customs declaration services, including import and export declarations of general and bonded goods, and project production machinery; customs declarations of triangular trade and entreport trade; export and import declarations of the whole plant equipment; applying letter of tax exemption for import goods duty from industrial development bureau; consultation service of tariff laws and regulations; and consolidation service of bonded warehouse, warehousing, transportation, stevedoring, and container terminals. It also provides transportation services comprising drayage of local and long distance shipments; less than truckload and full truckload; shipments moving from port, warehouse, and factories, as well as arranges local pick-up and delivery shipment integration and shipments through one point for shipping locations; and configured transportation solutions. In addition, the company offers warehousing services, such as general warehouse, warehouse rental, distribution center, bonded warehouse, and outdoor piling field; integration of reforming the goods, processing, packaging change, labeling, etc.; and ship stevedoring services, including warehouse cargo turn-in and out, and longshoring services. Further, it provides container terminal services comprising empty container services, such as cleaning, repairing, and checking services; information of containers and goods movement; accounts receivable collection on behalf of freight ship companies; CFS import and export cargo handling, distribution, and measurement services; pre-cooling, power, and inspection services; customs declaration and transportation arrangement services; and receiving and delivery, crane unloading, storage, inspection, and transfer services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

8374.TW.summary: Ace Pillar Co., Ltd., an industrial automation company, distributes automatic mechatronics components in Taiwan and internationally. It offers automation controller and monitor systems, such as human machine interfaces, PLCs, magnesensors/laserscales, CCD cameras, CNC machine tool solutions, and fanless embedded systems; and automation drive control systems, including servo systems, linear servo and direct drive motors, PACs, and high-speed motion control systems. The company also provides inverters; automation mechanical transmission systems comprising couplings, harmonic reducers, precision bearings, planetary reducers, linear guideways, and ETP bushings; and pneumatic components, such as air-operated valves for chemical liquids, air conditioning units, solenoid valves, pneumatic cylinders, multi axis stages, and power pack with inverters. In addition, it offers technical services for the automation manufactures and customers. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8926.TW.summary: Taiwan Cogeneration Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates cogeneration plants in Taiwan. The company invests in independent power plants (IPPs), cogeneration plants, and renewable energy power plants utilizing solar, wind, geothermal, and biomass energy. It also offers engineering planning, design, procurement, project development, installation, construction, financing, commissioning, operation, maintenance, and management for IPPs, cogeneration plants, and transmission projects. In addition, the company provides technical support and consulting services for power project investment, project development, construction execution, and power plant operation and maintenance. Taiwan Cogeneration Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8996.TW.summary: Kaori Heat Treatment Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells heat exchanger solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers brazed plate heat exchangers for use in HVAC, refrigeration, cooling, heating, heat recovery, green energy, and other industries, as well as for residential applications; and accessories, such as connectors, flanges, insulation foams, and stud bolts. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

9917.TW.summary: Taiwan Secom Co., Ltd. provides security services in Taiwan. It operates through four segments: Electronic System, Static Guard Service, Cash Delivery Service, and Logistics Service. The company manufactures, processes, and sells security-related equipment and parts, as well as offers corporate and building security guarding services; in-flight catering and related services; and cash delivery, logistic, air cargo transporting, building management, automated teller machine, custom broker, vehicle maintenance, educational and recreational, car parking lot, light controlling system, and technology support services. It also sells electric, telecommunication, fireproof, and other products; produces and sells instant foods; connects police-citizens; retails POS system; and rents automated external defibrillators and mini-storage, as well as rents and sells videos. In addition, the company manufactures and sells digital signage and monitors; wholesales and installs fire safety equipment; and retails and rents medical equipment. Further, it is involved in the provision of international trade, as well as acts as an insurance broker. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
