9933.TW.summary: CTCI Corporation provides engineering, procurement, and construction services in Taiwan, Asia, the Middle East, and the Americas. It offers various services, such as project management; feasibility study and front-end engineering design; engineering; procurement; fabrication; construction; commissioning; intelligent solutions; automation and control; intelligent structure jacking and movement; ground freezing; and operations and maintenance services, as well as clean room, mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering solutions The company also provides stationery equipment that includes pressure vessels; piping pre-fabrication and heat exchangers; and other specialized non-pressure parts, such as pre-fabricated parts of package equipment, as well as assists with engineering works that include basic design, equipment sizing, engineering, and shop drawings; and performs equipment inspection/revamping, plant shut-down inspection, and plant maintenance works. In addition, it offers intelligent energy management system, an integrated software that monitors, analyzes, adjusts, and manages energy consumption. Further, the company provides chemical additives, such as antifouling agents, antipolymerization additives, and corrosion inhibitors for petrochemical plants; antifoam additives, antifouling additives, corrosion inhibitors, and emulsion breaking additives for refinery plants; and heavy metal chelate agents, heavy metal stabilizers, boiler water treatment additives, and active carbon products for incineration plants. It serves hydrocarbon, power, environmental, transportation, and industrial markets. CTCI Corporation was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

9945.TW.summary: Ruentex Development Co., Ltd. provides construction and civil engineering contracting services in Taiwan and China. The company is involved in the construction of residential buildings through subcontracting; lease and sale of commercial buildings; trade of construction materials; sale of related merchandise; operation of supermarkets and shopping malls; undertaking of construction and civil engineering activities; and import/export, manufacture, and planning of precast constructional components, such as beams, columns, and walls, as well as provision of relevant electrical and mechanical works. It also installs cables, elevators, and fire safety equipment; operates department store; and manufactures waste disposal and pollution prevention equipment. In addition, the company offers mansions management, retirement home, general property management, maintenance, security, and building rental and selling services; investment management consulting and construction engineering, interior decoration and garden greening design and construction, and congregate housing services; and personal insurance products, including life insurance, health insurance, and damage insurance or annuity. Further, it manufactures, processes, spins, textiles, and sells garments, as well as involved in telecommunications enterprises and communication engineering activities; and manufactures, distributes, and sells building materials. The company was formerly known as Ruentex Construction Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ruentex Development Co., Ltd. in July 2002. Ruentex Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

APWC.long_name: Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corporation Limited
APWC.summary: Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corporation Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes telecommunications, power cable, and enameled and electronic wire products in Singapore, Thailand, Australia, the People's Republic of China, and other markets in the Asia Pacific region. The company offers telecommunications cable products, including copper-based and fiber optic cables for telephone and data transmissions; and armored and unarmored low voltage power transmission cable, which is used to transmit electricity to and within commercial and residential buildings, as well as to outdoor installations, such as street lights, traffic signals, and other signs. It also provides enameled wire for use in the assembly of a range of electrical products consisting of oil-filled transformers, refrigerator motors, telephones, radios, televisions, fan motors, air conditioner compressors, and other electric appliances. In addition, the company distributes wire and cable products; and offers project engineering services in the supply, delivery, and installation of power cables, as well as fabrication services for converting raw materials to wire and cable products. It serves government organizations, electric contracting firms, electrical dealers, and wire and cable factories. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of Pacific Electric Wire & Cable Co., Ltd.

CRKT.summary: Cirmaker Technology Corporation engages in the manufacture, distribution, and assembling of various electronic parts and components for sale primarily in the Asian markets. It provides electronic terminals, electronic blocks and accessories, electronic panel control and locking components, power distribution blocks and accessories, electronic timer and relay sockets, optical fiber connectors and adapters, car audio components, DVD players, electronics, cooling fins and systems for laptop and personal computers, and electrical tools, and other devices. The company also manufactures LCD backlight components and produces voice over Internet Protocol telephones. Further, it distributes or resells crimping tools, switches, cable ties, meters, sirens, power cords, and terminal strips, as well as imports and exports computer chips and various electronic products. Cirmaker Technology Corporation sells its products through sales personnel and marketing agents. The company was organized in 1984 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

DLZ.SG.long_name: Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corporation Limited
DLZ.SG.summary: Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corporation Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes telecommunications, power cable, and enameled and electronic wire products in Singapore, Thailand, Australia, the People's Republic of China, and other markets in the Asia Pacific region. The company offers telecommunications cable products, including copper-based and fiber optic cables for telephone and data transmissions; and armored and unarmored low voltage power transmission cable, which is used to transmit electricity to and within commercial and residential buildings, as well as to outdoor installations, such as street lights, traffic signals, and other signs. It also provides enameled wire for use in the assembly of a range of electrical products consisting of oil-filled transformers, refrigerator motors, telephones, radios, televisions, fan motors, air conditioner compressors, and other electric appliances. In addition, the company distributes wire and cable products; and offers project engineering services in the supply, delivery, and installation of power cables, as well as fabrication services for converting raw materials to wire and cable products. It serves government organizations, electric contracting firms, electrical dealers, and wire and cable factories. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of Pacific Electric Wire & Cable Co., Ltd.
